ComicInfo.Summary:
Runaway II Chapter 6: All Through The House...: Ms. Tree is tied to a chair with Christmas lights, her mouth sealed with red tape marked "Do Not Open Until Christmas". Harry and Dan are bound and gagged. Mr. C tells them Tracey's stunt cost him $500,000 and she has to sign a contract merging her company with his. After a failed attempt by Dan to overtake the mobsters Betty Eden's father enters carrying a shotgun. He kills Mr. C and Pex and is about to kill Eddie when Tracey stops him. She confronts him with having raped his own daughter, which he denies. Unseen by them, Glenn takes Pex's gun and kills Mr. Eden.
Runaway II Chapter Five: Exposure: Ms. Tree has punched out porn magazine owner Harry Rynd. Eddie Graham, another dirtbag, soon shows up bearing stuffed animals for Tracey. Tracey tells him that she hired Ms. Tree for protection. Back at the office, Roger and Michael have a conversation about Eddie Graham and his relationship with Cindi Duzit. Her secretary shows them a newspaper with Tracey's photo and the headline "Porn Star Underage". Later Ms. Tree talks to Sgt. Callis of the Vice Squad who confirms Tracey had been making kiddie porn. Ms. Tree returns to Graham's place but is surprised by Mr. C and his henchman.
Time Out for Murder: Dimm and Mist discuss the murder of Jeffery Tessa... possibly by somebody named Vicki Victoria.
ComicInfo.Tags: Tracey Lynn,Mike Mist,Lt Dimm,Dan Green,Dominique Muerta,Roger Freemont,Harry Rynd,Ms. Tree,Glenn Harwood
